mapper.select:
SELECT TOP 1 A.MODEL_ID, A.TITLE, A.BUILD_TYPE, convert(char(10), A.CREATE_DT,120) as CREATE_DT, A.CREATE_USER,
ROUND(B_SEAL_TYPE.CORRECT_RATE,10) as CORRECT_RATE_SEAL_TYPE, B_SEAL_TYPE.TRAINING_CNT as TRAINING_CNT_SEAL_TYPE, B_SEAL_TYPE.TEST_CNT as TEST_CNT_SEAL_TYPE, B_SEAL_TYPE.PROCESS_TIME as PROCESS_TIME_SEAL_TYPE,
ROUND(B_API_PLAN.CORRECT_RATE,10) as CORRECT_RATE_API_PLAN, B_API_PLAN.TRAINING_CNT as TRAINING_CNT_API_PLAN, B_API_PLAN.TEST_CNT as TEST_CNT_API_PLAN, B_API_PLAN.PROCESS_TIME as PROCESS_TIME_API_PLAN,
ROUND(B_CONN_COL.CORRECT_RATE,10) as CORRECT_RATE_CONN_COL, B_CONN_COL.TRAINING_CNT as TRAINING_CNT_CONN_COL, B_CONN_COL.TEST_CNT as TEST_CNT_CONN_COL, B_CONN_COL.PROCESS_TIME as PROCESS_TIME_CONN_COL,
convert(VARCHAR,convert(NUMERIC(5,2), ROUND(B_SEAL_TYPE.CORRECT_RATE,2))) +'/'+ convert(VARCHAR,convert(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND(B_API_PLAN.CORRECT_RATE,2))) +'/'+ convert(VARCHAR,convert(NUMERIC(5,2),ROUND(B_CONN_COL.CORRECT_RATE,2))) as CORRECT_RATE_ALL FROM ( SELECT MODEL_ID, max(TITLE) as TITLE, max(ATTR1) as BUILD_TYPE, max(CREATE_DT) as CREATE_DT, max(CREATE_USER) as CREATE_USER FROM TB_ML_MODEL_MNG GROUP BY MODEL_ID ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE, max(CORRECT_RATE) as CORRECT_RATE, max(TRAINING_CNT) as TRAINING_CNT, max(TEST_CNT) as TEST_CNT, max(PROCESS_TIME) as PROCESS_TIME FROM TB_ML_MODEL_MNG WHERE MODEL_SUB_TYPE = 'SEAL_TYPE' GROUP BY MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE ) B_SEAL_TYPE ON A.MODEL_ID = B_SEAL_TYPE.MODEL_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE, max(CORRECT_RATE) as CORRECT_RATE, max(TRAINING_CNT) as TRAINING_CNT, max(TEST_CNT) as TEST_CNT, max(PROCESS_TIME) as PROCESS_TIME FROM TB_ML_MODEL_MNG WHERE MODEL_SUB_TYPE = 'API_PLAN' GROUP BY MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE ) B_API_PLAN ON A.MODEL_ID = B_API_PLAN.MODEL_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE, max(CORRECT_RATE) as CORRECT_RATE, max(TRAINING_CNT) as TRAINING_CNT, max(TEST_CNT) as TEST_CNT, max(PROCESS_TIME) as PROCESS_TIME FROM TB_ML_MODEL_MNG WHERE MODEL_SUB_TYPE = 'CONN_COL' GROUP BY MODEL_ID, MODEL_SUB_TYPE ) B_CONN_COL ON A.MODEL_ID = B_CONN_COL.MODEL_ID
AND A.MODEL_ID=#{MODEL_ID} AND convert(char(8),A.CREATE_DT,112) >=#{DATE_FR} AND convert(char(8),A.CREATE_DT,112) <=#{DATE_TO}
ORDER BY A.MODEL_ID DESC

SELECT EQUIP_TYPE as EQUIP_TYPE, PUMP_TYPE_G as PUMP_TYPE, PRODUCT_G as PRODUCT, isnull(TEMP_NOR,0) as TEMP_NOR, isnull(TEMP_MIN,0) as TEMP_MIN, isnull(TEMP_MAX,0) as TEMP_MAX, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX, isnull(VISC_NOR,0) as VISC_NOR, isnull(VISC_MIN,0) as VISC_MIN, isnull(VISC_MAX,0) as VISC_MAX, isnull(VAP_PRES_NOR,0) as VAP_PRES_NOR, isnull(VAP_PRES_MIN,0) as VAP_PRES_MIN, isnull(VAP_PRES_MAX,0) as VAP_PRES_MAX, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_NOR,0) as SEAL_CHAM_NOR, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_MIN,0) as SEAL_CHAM_MIN, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_MAX,0) as SEAL_CHAM_MAX,
isnull(RPM_NOR,0) as RPM_NOR, isnull(RPM_MIN,0) as RPM_MIN, isnull(RPM_MAX,0) as RPM_MAX, isnull(SHAFT_SIZE,0) as SHAFT_SIZE,
SEAL_TYPE as SEAL_TYPE API_PLAN as API_PLAN SEAL_TYPE + ' | ' + MATERIAL +' | ' + API_PLAN as CONN_COL FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' AND SEAL_TYPE != '-' AND API_PLAN !='-'
AND SEAL_TYPE != '-' AND MATERIAL !='-' AND API_PLAN != '-'
ORDER BY SEAL_TYPE ORDER BY API_PLAN ORDER BY SEAL_TYPE + ' | '+ MATERIAL +' | '+ API_PLAN
SELECT * FROM M_DATA_CNV1
SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_G as PRODUCT FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ORDER BY PRODUCT_G
SELECT DISTINCT PUMP_TYPE_G as PUMP_TYPE FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ORDER BY PUMP_TYPE_G
SELECT DISTINCT EQUIP_TYPE as EQUIP_TYPE FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ORDER BY EQUIP_TYPE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_MNG( MODEL_ID, MODEL_TYPE, MODEL_SUB_TYPE, CORRECT_RATE, CORR_COEF, MEAN_ABS_ERR, RMSE, RAE, RRSE, TRAINING_CNT, TEST_CNT, MODEL_LOC, REMARKS, CREATE_DT, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_USER, TITLE, PROCESS_TIME, ATTR1, ATTR2, ATTR3 ) VALUES ( #{MODEL_ID}, #{MODEL_TYPE}, #{MODEL_SUB_TYPE}, #{CORRECT_RATE}, #{CORR_COEF}, #{MEAN_ABS_ERR}, #{RMSE}, #{RAE}, #{RRSE}, #{TRAINING_CNT}, #{TEST_CNT}, #{MODEL_LOC}, #{REMARKS}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, #{TITLE}, #{PROCESS_TIME}, #{ATTR1}, #{ATTR2}, #{ATTR3} )

INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_ATTR ( MODEL_ID,ATTR_TYPE,SEQ,V_VAL1, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${ATTR_TYPE}', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT ASC), PRODUCT, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_G as PRODUCT FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ) A ORDER BY A.PRODUCT

INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_ATTR ( MODEL_ID,ATTR_TYPE,SEQ,V_VAL1, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${ATTR_TYPE}', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PUMP_TYPE ASC), PUMP_TYPE, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PUMP_TYPE_G as PUMP_TYPE FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ) A ORDER BY A.PUMP_TYPE

INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_ATTR ( MODEL_ID,ATTR_TYPE,SEQ,V_VAL1, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${ATTR_TYPE}', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EQUIP_TYPE ASC), EQUIP_TYPE, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT EQUIP_TYPE as EQUIP_TYPE FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE EQUIP_TYPE != 'Comp.' ) A ORDER BY A.EQUIP_TYPE

INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_ATTR ( MODEL_ID,ATTR_TYPE,SEQ, V_VAL1, V_VAL2, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${ATTR_TYPE}', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GRP ASC, GRP_SUB ASC), GRP, GRP_SUB, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM ( SELECT upper(A.CODE_VALUE) AS GRP, upper(B.DETAIL_VALUES) AS GRP_SUB FROM TB_FEA_CODE A JOIN TB_FEA_GRP_INFO B ON A.CODE_NAME= B.FEA_CODE JOIN TB_CODE C ON A.PARENT_CODE=C.CODE_NAME WHERE C.CODE_VALUE=#{GRP_CODE} ) A ORDER BY A.GRP, A.GRP_SUB

INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_ATTR ( MODEL_ID,ATTR_TYPE,SEQ, V_VAL1, V_VAL2, V_VAL3, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${ATTR_TYPE}', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LEVEL_1 ASC, LEVEL_2 ASC, LEVEL_3 ASC), upper(LEVEL_1) as LEVEL_1, upper(LEVEL_2) as LEVEL_2, upper(LEVEL_3) as LEVEL_3, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM ( SELECT A.LEVEL_1,A.LEVEL_2,A.LEVEL_3 FROM TB_FEA_HIERA A ) A ORDER BY A.LEVEL_1, A.LEVEL_2, A.LEVEL_3
mapper.select: SELECT GRP_CODE, VAL_CODE, case when V_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN V_VAL else rtrim(convert(decimal(6,4),N_VAL)) end as VAL FROM TB_TRANS_TXT_VAL ORDER BY ORD
SELECT * from M_DATA_ORG_1

SELECT GRP_CODE, replace(replace(rtrim(UNIT_CODE), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as UNIT_CODE, replace(replace(rtrim(UNIT_NAME), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as UNIT_NAME, replace(replace(rtrim(EX_UNIT_NAME), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as EX_UNIT_NAME, TRANS_CODE, DESCRIPTION, CALC_STR from TB_TRANS_UNIT_CODE
SELECT * from TB_UNIT_CODE_REL WHERE TABLE_NAME='M_DATA_CNV1'
SELECT * from TB_TRANS_TXT_VAL
SELECT * from M_VISC_SSU_CHG ORDER BY SSU desc

SELECT C.CODE_VALUE as COL_VALUE, A.CODE_NAME as GRP_CODE, upper(A.CODE_VALUE) as GRP, upper(B.DETAIL_VALUES) as GRP_SUB FROM TB_FEA_CODE A JOIN TB_FEA_GRP_INFO B ON A.CODE_NAME= B.FEA_CODE JOIN TB_CODE C ON A.PARENT_CODE=C.CODE_NAME WHERE C.CODE_VALUE=#{value} --ORDER BY A.CODE_VALUE , B.DETAIL_VALUES ORDER BY LEN(B.DETAIL_VALUES) desc, B.DETAIL_VALUES
SELECT upper(LEVEL_1) as LV1, upper(LEVEL_2) as LV2, upper(LEVEL_3) as LV3 FROM TB_FEA_HIERA ORDER BY 1,2,3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_DATA_CNV1 ( IDX_NO , DWG_NO , DWG_REV , SHEET_NO , FORM_NO , JOB_NO , BOM , DATA_LAST , SEAL_TYPE , SEAL_TYPE_I , SEAL_TYPE_M , SEAL_TYPE_O , SEAL_SIZE , SEAL_SIZE_I , SEAL_SIZE_I_UNIT , SEAL_SIZE_M , SEAL_SIZE_M_UNIT , SEAL_SIZE_O , SEAL_SIZE_O_UNIT , SEAL_CONFIG , MATERIAL , MATERIAL_I1 , MATERIAL_I2 , MATERIAL_I3 , MATERIAL_I4 , MATERIAL_I5 , MATERIAL_I6 , MATERIAL_I7 , MATERIAL_M1 , MATERIAL_M2 , MATERIAL_M3 , MATERIAL_M4 , MATERIAL_M5 , MATERIAL_M6 , MATERIAL_M7 , MATERIAL_O1 , MATERIAL_O2 , MATERIAL_O3 , MATERIAL_O4 , MATERIAL_O5 , MATERIAL_O6 , MATERIAL_O7 , EQUIP_MFG , EQUIP_MODEL , CUSTOMER , ULTIMATE_USER , PRODUCT , TEMP_NOR , TEMP_MIN , TEMP_MAX , TEMP_UNIT , SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR , SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN , SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX , VISC_NOR , VISC_MIN , VISC_MAX , VISC_UNIT , VAP_PRES_NOR , VAP_PRES_MIN , VAP_PRES_MAX , VAP_PRES_UNIT , SEAL_CHAM_NOR , SEAL_CHAM_MIN , SEAL_CHAM_MAX , SEAL_CHAM_UNIT , SUCT_PRES_NOR , SUCT_PRES_MIN , SUCT_PRES_MAX , SUCT_PRES_UNIT , DISCH_PRES_NOR , DISCH_PRES_MIN , DISCH_PRES_MAX , DISCH_PRES_UNIT , RPM_NOR , RPM_MIN , RPM_MAX , EQUIP_ITEM_NO , API_PLAN , API_CODE , SEAL_CODE , SERVICE , EXTERNAL_FLUID , BARRIER_BUFFER_FLUID , BARR_PRES_PRES , BARR_PRES_UNIT , PO_NO , PROJECT , SHAFT_SIZE , SHAFT_UNIT , EQUIP_TYPE , PUMP_TYPE , PRODUCT_G , PUMP_TYPE_G , EQUIP_MFG_G , ULTIMATE_USER_G , SEAL_SIZE_I_C , SEAL_SIZE_M_C , SEAL_SIZE_O_C , TEMP_NOR_C , TEMP_MIN_C , TEMP_MAX_C , VISC_NOR_C , VISC_MIN_C , VISC_MAX_C , VAP_PRES_NOR_C , VAP_PRES_MIN_C , VAP_PRES_MAX_C , SEAL_CHAM_NOR_C , SEAL_CHAM_MIN_C , SEAL_CHAM_MAX_C , SUCT_PRES_NOR_C , SUCT_PRES_MIN_C , SUCT_PRES_MAX_C , DISCH_PRES_NOR_C , DISCH_PRES_MIN_C , DISCH_PRES_MAX_C , BARR_PRES_PRES_C , RPM_NOR_C , RPM_MIN_C , RPM_MAX_C , SHAFT_SIZE_C, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{IDX_NO}, #{DWG_NO}, #{DWG_REV}, #{SHEET_NO}, #{FORM_NO}, #{JOB_NO}, #{BOM}, #{DATA_LAST}, #{SEAL_TYPE}, #{SEAL_TYPE_I}, #{SEAL_TYPE_M}, #{SEAL_TYPE_O}, #{SEAL_SIZE}, #{SEAL_SIZE_I}, #{SEAL_SIZE_I_UNIT}, #{SEAL_SIZE_M}, #{SEAL_SIZE_M_UNIT}, #{SEAL_SIZE_O}, #{SEAL_SIZE_O_UNIT}, #{SEAL_CONFIG}, #{MATERIAL}, #{MATERIAL_I1}, #{MATERIAL_I2}, #{MATERIAL_I3}, #{MATERIAL_I4}, #{MATERIAL_I5}, #{MATERIAL_I6}, #{MATERIAL_I7}, #{MATERIAL_M1}, #{MATERIAL_M2}, #{MATERIAL_M3}, #{MATERIAL_M4}, #{MATERIAL_M5}, #{MATERIAL_M6}, #{MATERIAL_M7}, #{MATERIAL_O1}, #{MATERIAL_O2}, #{MATERIAL_O3}, #{MATERIAL_O4}, #{MATERIAL_O5}, #{MATERIAL_O6}, #{MATERIAL_O7}, #{EQUIP_MFG}, #{EQUIP_MODEL}, #{CUSTOMER}, #{ULTIMATE_USER}, #{PRODUCT}, #{TEMP_NOR}, #{TEMP_MIN}, #{TEMP_MAX}, #{TEMP_UNIT}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX}, #{VISC_NOR}, #{VISC_MIN}, #{VISC_MAX}, #{VISC_UNIT}, #{VAP_PRES_NOR}, #{VAP_PRES_MIN}, #{VAP_PRES_MAX}, #{VAP_PRES_UNIT}, #{SEAL_CHAM_NOR}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX}, #{SEAL_CHAM_UNIT}, #{SUCT_PRES_NOR}, #{SUCT_PRES_MIN}, #{SUCT_PRES_MAX}, #{SUCT_PRES_UNIT}, #{DISCH_PRES_NOR}, #{DISCH_PRES_MIN}, #{DISCH_PRES_MAX}, #{DISCH_PRES_UNIT}, #{RPM_NOR}, #{RPM_MIN}, #{RPM_MAX}, #{EQUIP_ITEM_NO}, #{API_PLAN}, #{API_CODE}, #{SEAL_CODE}, #{SERVICE}, #{EXTERNAL_FLUID}, #{BARRIER_BUFFER_FLUID}, #{BARR_PRES_PRES}, #{BARR_PRES_UNIT}, #{PO_NO}, #{PROJECT}, #{SHAFT_SIZE}, #{SHAFT_UNIT}, #{EQUIP_TYPE}, #{PUMP_TYPE}, #{PRODUCT_G}, #{PUMP_TYPE_G}, #{EQUIP_MFG_G}, #{ULTIMATE_USER_G}, #{SEAL_SIZE_I_C}, #{SEAL_SIZE_M_C}, #{SEAL_SIZE_O_C}, #{TEMP_NOR_C}, #{TEMP_MIN_C}, #{TEMP_MAX_C}, #{VISC_NOR_C}, #{VISC_MIN_C}, #{VISC_MAX_C}, #{VAP_PRES_NOR_C}, #{VAP_PRES_MIN_C}, #{VAP_PRES_MAX_C}, #{SEAL_CHAM_NOR_C}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN_C}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX_C}, #{SUCT_PRES_NOR_C}, #{SUCT_PRES_MIN_C}, #{SUCT_PRES_MAX_C}, #{DISCH_PRES_NOR_C}, #{DISCH_PRES_MIN_C}, #{DISCH_PRES_MAX_C}, #{BARR_PRES_PRES_C}, #{RPM_NOR_C}, #{RPM_MIN_C}, #{RPM_MAX_C}, #{SHAFT_SIZE_C}, getdate() )

INSERT INTO M_DATA_CNV2_1 ( IDX_NO , DWG_NO , DWG_REV , SHEET_NO , JOB_NO , SEAL_TYPE , SEAL_TYPE_I , SEAL_TYPE_M , SEAL_TYPE_O , SEAL_SIZE , SEAL_SIZE_I , SEAL_SIZE_M , SEAL_SIZE_O , MATERIAL , MATERIAL_I1 , MATERIAL_I2 , MATERIAL_I3 , MATERIAL_I4 , MATERIAL_I5 , MATERIAL_I6 , MATERIAL_I7 , MATERIAL_M1 , MATERIAL_M2 , MATERIAL_M3 , MATERIAL_M4 , MATERIAL_M5 , MATERIAL_M6 , MATERIAL_M7 , MATERIAL_O1 , MATERIAL_O2 , MATERIAL_O3 , MATERIAL_O4 , MATERIAL_O5 , MATERIAL_O6 , MATERIAL_O7 , PRODUCT , TEMP_NOR , TEMP_MIN , TEMP_MAX , SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR , SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN , SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX , VISC_NOR , VISC_MIN , VISC_MAX , VAP_PRES_NOR , VAP_PRES_MIN , VAP_PRES_MAX , SEAL_CHAM_NOR , SEAL_CHAM_MIN , SEAL_CHAM_MAX , SUCT_PRES_NOR , SUCT_PRES_MIN , SUCT_PRES_MAX , DISCH_PRES_NOR , DISCH_PRES_MIN , DISCH_PRES_MAX , RPM_NOR , RPM_MIN , RPM_MAX , API_PLAN , BARR_PRES_PRES , SHAFT_SIZE , EQUIP_TYPE, PUMP_TYPE, PRODUCT_G , PUMP_TYPE_G , EQUIP_MFG_G , ULTIMATE_USER_G , UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{IDX_NO}, #{DWG_NO}, #{DWG_REV}, #{SHEET_NO}, #{JOB_NO}, #{SEAL_TYPE}, #{SEAL_TYPE_I}, #{SEAL_TYPE_M}, #{SEAL_TYPE_O}, #{SEAL_SIZE}, #{SEAL_SIZE_I, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SEAL_SIZE_M, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SEAL_SIZE_O, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{MATERIAL}, #{MATERIAL_I1}, #{MATERIAL_I2}, #{MATERIAL_I3}, #{MATERIAL_I4}, #{MATERIAL_I5}, #{MATERIAL_I6}, #{MATERIAL_I7}, #{MATERIAL_M1}, #{MATERIAL_M2}, #{MATERIAL_M3}, #{MATERIAL_M4}, #{MATERIAL_M5}, #{MATERIAL_M6}, #{MATERIAL_M7}, #{MATERIAL_O1}, #{MATERIAL_O2}, #{MATERIAL_O3}, #{MATERIAL_O4}, #{MATERIAL_O5}, #{MATERIAL_O6}, #{MATERIAL_O7}, #{PRODUCT}, #{TEMP_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{TEMP_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{TEMP_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VISC_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VISC_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VISC_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VAP_PRES_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VAP_PRES_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{VAP_PRES_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SEAL_CHAM_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SUCT_PRES_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SUCT_PRES_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SUCT_PRES_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{DISCH_PRES_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{DISCH_PRES_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{DISCH_PRES_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{RPM_NOR, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{RPM_MIN, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{RPM_MAX, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{API_PLAN}, #{BARR_PRES_PRES, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SHAFT_SIZE, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{EQUIP_TYPE}, #{PUMP_TYPE}, #{PRODUCT_G}, #{PUMP_TYPE_G}, #{EQUIP_MFG_G}, #{ULTIMATE_USER_G}, getdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT distinct GRP_CODE, replace(replace(rtrim(UNIT_CODE), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as UNIT_CODE, replace(replace(rtrim(UNIT_NAME), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as UNIT_NAME, replace(replace(rtrim(EX_UNIT_NAME), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as EX_UNIT_NAME FROM TB_TRANS_UNIT_CODE
SELECT COL_NAME, BASE_COL FROM TB_UNIT_CODE_REL
SELECT IDX, TYPE, SEAL_TYPE FROM TB_SEAL_TYPE_T_INFO WHERE TYPE = 'P'
SELECT IDX, TYPE, SEAL_TYPE FROM TB_SEAL_TYPE_T_INFO WHERE TYPE = 'A'
SELECT IDX, R_TYPE, SEAL_TYPE, EQUIP_TYPE FROM TB_SEAL_TYPE_P_INFO

SELECT isnull(TEMP_NOR,0) as TEMP_NOR, isnull(TEMP_MIN,0) as TEMP_MIN, isnull(TEMP_MAX,0) as TEMP_MAX, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN, isnull(SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX,0) as SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX, isnull(VISC_NOR,0) as VISC_NOR, isnull(VISC_MIN,0) as VISC_MIN, isnull(VISC_MAX,0) as VISC_MAX, isnull(VAP_PRES_NOR,0) as VAP_PRES_NOR, isnull(VAP_PRES_MIN,0) as VAP_PRES_MIN, isnull(VAP_PRES_MAX,0) as VAP_PRES_MAX, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_NOR,0) as SEAL_CHAM_NOR, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_MIN,0) as SEAL_CHAM_MIN, isnull(SEAL_CHAM_MAX,0) as SEAL_CHAM_MAX, replace(SEAL_TYPE,',','') as SEAL_TYPE, replace(API_PLAN,',','') as API_PLAN, replace(SEAL_TYPE,',','') +' | '+replace(MATERIAL,',','')+' | '+replace(API_PLAN,',','') as CONN_COL FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1 WHERE 1=1
AND
PRODUCT_G like '%' + #{product} + '%'
AND equip_type = #{equip_type} AND PUMP_TYPE_G = #{PUMP_TYPE}

SELECT MODEL_ID, FEATURE_COL, MIN_VAL, MAX_VAL FROM TB_ML_MODEL_FEATURE_RANGE WHERE MODEL_ID = (SELECT MAX(MODEL_ID)AS MAX_MODEL_ID FROM TB_ML_MODEL_FEATURE_RANGE) ORDER BY CASE FEATURE_COL WHEN 'TEMP_NOR' THEN 1 WHEN 'TEMP_MIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'TEMP_MAX' THEN 3 WHEN 'SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR' THEN 4 WHEN 'SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN' THEN 5 WHEN 'SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX' THEN 6 WHEN 'VISC_NOR' THEN 7 WHEN 'VISC_MIN' THEN 8 WHEN 'VISC_MAX' THEN 9 WHEN 'VAP_PRES_NOR' THEN 10 WHEN 'VAP_PRES_MIN' THEN 11 WHEN 'VAP_PRES_MAX' THEN 12 WHEN 'SEAL_CHAM_NOR' THEN 13 WHEN 'SEAL_CHAM_MIN' THEN 14 WHEN 'SEAL_CHAM_MAX' THEN 15 WHEN 'RPM_NOR' THEN 16 WHEN 'RPM_MIN' THEN 17 WHEN 'RPM_MAX' THEN 18 WHEN 'SHAFT_SIZE' THEN 19 END;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ML_MODEL_FEATURE_RANGE ( MODEL_ID,FEATURE_COL,MIN_VAL,MAX_VAL, CREATE_DT,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DT,UPDATE_USER ) SELECT '${MODEL_ID}', '${FEATURE_COL}', MIN(${FEATURE_COL})as MIN_VAL, MAX(${FEATURE_COL})as MAX_VAL, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID}, GETDATE(), #{USER_ID} FROM M_DATA_CNV2_1
mapper.select: SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(MCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as MCD, replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE SCD != 'MCD'
SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z050' AND ATTR1 = #{SCD}

SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z060' AND ATTR1 = #{SCD1} AND ATTR3 = #{SCD2}
SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z120' AND SCD !='MCD'
SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z130' AND SCD !='MCD'
SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z110' AND SCD !='MCD'
SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z140' AND SCD !='MCD'

SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z070' AND SCD !='MCD' AND 'Z140010' = #{SCD1}

SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z080' AND SCD !='MCD' AND ATTR1 = #{SCD1}

SELECT replace(replace(rtrim(SCD), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as SCD, replace(replace(rtrim(CD_NM), char(13), ''), char(10), '') as CD_NM FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD = 'Z090' AND SCD !='MCD' AND ATTR1 = #{SCD1}

SELECT SUB_NO ,HISTORY_ID ,I_NO as NO ,PUMP_TYPE as PUMP_TYPE_TEXT ,PUMP_TYPE ,PRODUCT ,TEMP_TEXT ,TEMP_UNIT ,TEMP_NOR ,TEMP_MIN ,TEMP_MAX ,SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR ,SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN ,SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX ,VISC_MIN_C ,VISC_MAX_C ,VAP_PRES_NOR_C ,VAP_PRES_MIN_C ,VAP_PRES_MAX_C ,SEAL_CHAM_NOR_C ,SEAL_CHAM_MIN_C ,SEAL_CHAM_MAX_C ,RPM_NOR_C ,RPM_MIN_C ,RPM_MAX_C ,SHAFT_SIZE_C ,FTA_YN ,FTA_YN_TEXT ,SOLID_SIZE_MIN ,SOLID_SIZE_MAX ,SOLID_CONT ,H2S_CONT ,H2SO4_CONT ,SULFUR_CONT ,CHLORIDE_CONT ,PH ,CRUID_WATER_CONT ,BRINE_GB_TEXT ,BRINE_GB ,OIL_HRDN_YN_TEXT ,OIL_HRDN_YN ,RESI_CLEAN_GB_TEXT ,RESI_CLEAN_GB ,RESI_HRDN_GB_TEXT ,RESI_HRDN_GB ,SEAL_SIZE ,END_USER_TEXT ,END_USER ,GROUP_TEXT ,GROUP_VAL ,SERVICE_GS_TEXT ,SERVICE_GS ,CASE_TEXT ,CASE_VAL ,SEAL_TYPE_DIR ,MATERIAL_DIR ,API_PLAN_DIR ,API682_YN_TEXT ,API682_YN ,BELLOWS_YN_TEXT ,BELLOWS_YN ,CARTRIDGE_TYPE_TEXT ,CARTRIDGE_TYPE ,SEAL_CONFIG_TEXT ,SEAL_CONFIG ,SPLIT_YN_TEXT ,SPLIT_YN ,PC_TOXIC_CHK ,PC_HAZARD_CHK ,PC_FLAM_CHK ,PC_LEAKAGE_CHK ,PC_HIGH_CORR_CHK ,PRODUCTNM_1 ,PRODUCTNM_2 ,PRODUCTNM_3 ,PRODUCTNM_4 ,PRODUCTNM_5 ,PRODUCTNM_6 ,PRODUCTNM_7 ,PRODUCTNM_8 ,PRODUCTNM_9 ,PRODUCTNM_10 ,PRODUCTNM_11 ,PRODUCTNM_12
